name: Reaction Training
description: Training to enhance reflex speed, defensive reaction time, and combat decision-making in high-pressure scenarios.

workout_groups.name: Fundamentals of Reaction Timing
workout_groups.description: Building core reactionary speed and instinctive defensive responses.

workouts.name: Basic Reflex Response Drill
workouts.description: React to a visual or auditory cue by performing a quick defensive movement.

workouts.name: Hand Speed Reaction Drill
workouts.description: Rapidly move hands in response to a random directional command.

workouts.name: Dodge & Return Drill
workouts.description: Dodge an incoming simulated strike and return with an immediate counterattack.

workouts.name: Low-Light Reaction Training
workouts.description: Perform reaction drills under dim or flashing lights to simulate real-world unpredictability.

workout_groups.name: Unpredictable Attack & Defense Scenarios
workout_groups.description: Enhancing rapid adaptation to real-time combat threats.

workouts.name: Randomized Strike Evasion Drill
workouts.description: React to randomly assigned attack patterns, dodging and countering accordingly.

workouts.name: Multi-Directional Dodge & Counter
workouts.description: Evade strikes from various angles while returning rapid counterattacks.

workouts.name: Reaction Chain Training
workouts.description: Perform a sequence of defensive and offensive actions triggered by random stimuli.

workouts.name: Sparring-Based Reflex Training
workouts.description: Engage in light sparring where the primary focus is on reaction speed.

workout_groups.name: Elite Combat Reaction Mastery
workout_groups.description: Mastering instantaneous reactions and strategic adaptability in high-stress engagements.

workouts.name: Ambidextrous Reaction Drill
workouts.description: Switch between left and right-handed defensive and offensive reactions in response to unpredictable threats.

workouts.name: Blindfolded Reflex Training
workouts.description: Use auditory and tactile cues to react without visual input, increasing combat awareness.

workouts.name: Unpredictable Multi-Opponent Defense
workouts.description: React and defend against simultaneous attacks from multiple angles.

workouts.name: Live Combat Reaction Sparring
workouts.description: Engage in high-speed sparring where reactions are tested under real-time conditions.
